lexUnit.name: edge.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: to go along the edge of; move carefully

sentence.text: Our path dropped down to the relative calm of the sea shore , edging craggy inlets beneath overhanging cliff tops .
The estate-car reeled drunkenly , shot sideways across the road and oncoming traffic , and came to rest with its bonnet jammed in the sloping grass bank edging the road on the other side .
She had to get them away from the rocks that edged the shore like jagged teeth .
Nothing could have been a greater contrast to the Hamptons -- where miles and miles of unspoilt coastline and white sands edged the rugged Atlantic Ocean .
Now he ran along the concrete passage that edged the stack-yard .
Crowninshield walked a few paces in silence until he was standing under the palms which edged the lagoon .
Her habits of riding out are known , and she often goes to the forest that edges the marsh .
There were a few trees edging the pavement , but they were an urban stock , twisted and stunted by city poisons .
In these ancient , mountainous regions -- the Alps and the Carpathians -- the City stopped abruptly , edging the wilderness .
Nearly every lane is edged by a dyke to drain the land .
The Witham is edged by warehouses , mainly of the eighteenth century .
Here the fenceless field spread out to the ditch which was edged with hawthorn , elder and hazel marking its further boundary , a huge stretch of green-gold already lightening .
Meanwhile , the canal is edged with black bricks laid with black mortar which provides a very smart finish to the canal .
She sat on the chair by the window and gazed out at the wide lawns edged by chestnut trees .
We called first at the post office , set in a square edged by trees , wells and the concrete facades of offices flying the red , white and green national flag .
The track -- optimistically marked on the map as Daleside Road -- edged through a final gate and onto the road .
By this time Paddy seemed to be quite enjoying himself as we trotted on through the silent , thistle-filled fields edged with woods .
Her stomach edged up over the waistband of her slacks .
